EnExplanation: The word 'kuni' is used to indicate the time until a certain event occurs or a limit is reached.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma ootan siin kuni sa tuled.
Samples.EnSentence: I will wait here until you come.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma ootan sind kuni kella viieni.
Samples.EnSentence: I will wait for you until five o'clock.
